title: FS or Trade:  E.R. Williams Game, Buffington/Caruthers PSA 7

posts.post_title: FS or Trade:  E.R. Williams Game, Buffington/Caruthers PSA 7
posts.post_content:
None graded higher, only one equal.  Caruthers always a Hall of Fame candidate.  $329.50 plus $3 postage.
